name: browserslist-new-relic
description: A CLI tool that generates a custom usage data file for browserslist from your New Relic Browser data.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist/lib && cp -a ./lib/*.js ./dist/lib/ && rm -rf ./dist/lib/__tests__ && cp -a ./index.js ./dist/ && cp -a ./package.json ./dist/ && cp -a ./LICENSE ./dist/ && cp -a ./README.md ./dist/

author: Ken Pereira
